EmailTemplate.name: Data Services - PIN
EmailTemplate.subject: Data Services - PIN
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Data Services PIN
Dear {!Contact.Name},
Below is your PIN required to upload and download your company file. Please keep this email for your reference.
{!Case.External_PIN__c}
New with Data Services!
* Visit the Data Services Case Status Information page to get the latest updates with your company file, if you lost your File Transfer PIN, or QuickBooks Password. * Communicate with the agent assigned to your case without having to leave a voicemail or send an separate email.
Thank you, Intuit Data Services icu_status@intuit.com
This is an automated email. Please do not reply directly as you will not receive a response.
